publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1513 Kenny MacAskill: Pensions Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament agrees that the relevant provisions of the UK Pensions Bill, introduced in the House of Commons on 5 December 2007, which legislate in devolved areas in respect of pension compensation on divorce or dissolution of a marriage or civil partnership, should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-1513 Kenny MacAskill: Pensions Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament agrees that the relevant provisions of the UK Pensions Bill, introduced in the House of Commons on 5 December 2007, which legislate in devolved areas in respect of pension compensation on divorce or dissolution of a marriage or civil partnership, should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
